news.title: The LCD Steam Deck is done
news.summary: The most affordable Steam Deck, the $399 LCD model, is not available in the US. And, according to the Steam Deck site, it won't be coming back. news.title: Show HN: Claude Code Plugin to play music when waiting on user input
news.summary:
Claude Code tends to be just slow enough you have time to tab away and get distracted. This plugin uses Claude Code's hooks to play music when Claude is waiting for user input so you don't just leave it sitting for 15 minutes.
